Title: Abbagail's law prohibits supervising drivers from acting under the influence of alcohol and/or drugs
Summary: Enacts Abbagail's law prohibiting supervising drivers from acting under the influence of alcohol and/or drugs and subjects them to criminal charges.
LawCode: Add ยง1192-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to acting as a supervising driver while under the influence of alcohol and/or drugs
